order: 1
title: Overview
subtitle: General specifications
---

Part of the BDM is common to all datasets, regardless of the specific type of activity. This includes:

[**Folder structure**](2-folder-structure.qmd)
: a BDM dataset is a folder that contains data files and all relevant information needed to make sense of the data.

[**Dataset card**](3-dataset-card.qmd)
: Dataset cards provides metadata and information about a dataset. Dataset card also includes codebook which describes the semantics, structure, and format of the data variables.

[**Studyflow**](4-studyflow.qmd)
: Studyflow describes the sequence of activities in a study.

[**Indices**](5-indices.qmd)
: Indices are used to identify and address data records.

[**Instructions**](6-instructions.qmd)
: Instructions provide additional guidance and help about tasks presented to subjects in a study.
